name: Mr. Saman Perera
title: Science Tutor
bio: With over 15 years of experience teaching Science for O/L students, I am passionate about making complex concepts simple and engaging. My student-centered approach has helped hundreds of students achieve excellent results.
teachingStyle: I believe in interactive learning, practical demonstrations, and personalized attention. Every student learns differently, and I adapt my teaching methods to ensure everyone understands the fundamentals.
